title: Túmulo-Monumento
body: This is the name given to the monument erected in the cemetery of Angústias, in memory of those who were brutally killed by the grenades of a German submarine on December 3, 1916. We have already provided a brief account of it on page 68 of Volume I of this work, to which we refer the reader. It was handed over to the Municipal Council of this municipality on December 15, 1917. See Monuments.

Angústias: Location where the Túmulo-Monumento monument was erected

1916: Date on which people were killed by the grenades of a German submarine
1917: Date on which the Túmulo-Monumento monument was handed over to the Municipal Council
